description: All agent activities have the same count of 47, which is unusual and may indicate a logging or reporting error.
recommendation: Investigate the logging mechanism to ensure that agent activities are being recorded accurately. Verify if the activities are genuinely uniform or if there is an issue in data collection.

description: API latency is significantly higher than other performance metrics, which could indicate a bottleneck or inefficiency in the system.
recommendation: Conduct a detailed analysis of the API endpoints to identify potential bottlenecks. Consider optimizing the code or infrastructure to reduce latency.

description: Throughput is notably higher compared to CPU and memory usage, which might suggest an imbalance in resource allocation.
recommendation: Review the resource allocation strategy to ensure that CPU and memory resources are adequately supporting the throughput demands. Consider scaling resources if necessary.

description: All compliance checks are marked as true, which is expected but should be periodically verified to ensure ongoing compliance.
recommendation: Regularly audit the compliance checks to ensure they are functioning correctly and that the system remains compliant with security, performance, and reliability standards.
